name: The Sims 2: Bon Voyage
description:
Choose from three exotic locales — the mountain wilderness of Three Lakes, the Eastern adventure of Takemizu Village, or the tropical fun of Twikkii Island — to suit your Sims’ taste. Pick a luxury hotel, or let them rough it in a more humble abode.

While on vacation, your Sims don’t need to work or attend school, but don’t worry: The Sims 2: Bon Voyage provides plenty for them to do. Send them on a boat ride, have them build a sand castle, or let them tell stories around the campfire. Create new Sims for them to meet, such as ninjas and pirates, and teach them new skills like dancing and local gestures. The fun they have affects their daily lives, resulting in improved relationships and other perks. The Sims 2: Bon Voyage even has a few surprises lurking around the corners. Download a copy onto your PC and give your creations the rest and relaxation they deserve.
